channel.title: I have varoius questions I like awnsered please
channel.description:
These 6 things i have no clue about :confused: :confused: :| :confused: :confused:
1. I have no clue how to change max levels. 2. Could you explain how I could make safe zones and delete some. 3. How to use the emotes as a command. 4. How to enhance or make the login screen better. 5. Is there a tut that prevents monsters from deforming when you attack them? 6. How do you change how a charecter holds a weapon? Like a 2h is usually held on the shoulder I want to make it so the charecter holds it outward with one hand like a regular sword.
I also want to ask one more thing from you lol... I lost lemezes compiler could someone please post the code?
Thank you for letting me waist your time ;)

item.title: I have varoius questions I like awnsered please
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

I can hopefully answer most of these…here we go:

  1. search for (NOTE: this is if your max combat level is currently 99) return 99; change that 99 to whatever you want your max level to be.

  2. Safezones work like this: (absX >= (X-SW CORNER) && absX <= (X-NE CORNER) && absY >= (Y-SW CORNER) && absY <= (Y-NE CORNER)) so, if you wanted to make the lumbridge castle-courtyard a safe zone, you would add this: || (absX >= 3204 && absX <= 3303 && absY >= 3202 && absY <= 3375)//Lumby Note, You would add this under, public boolean inSafezone() { // By Andyy

  3. This is very easy to learn (once you know what your doing :)) Okay, say you want the “laugh emote” to do something, say, teleport you somewhere, search case 170 in client.java (to know what case it is, put your cursor over the emote bar) and you’ll see: case 170: // laugh emote to make this teleport you to falador, make it this: case 170: // laugh emote { teleportToX = 2966; teleportToY = 3379; } break; Now, To change what it says…You’ll need to know the interface of it (some servers have an interface.cfg list already in there, if not, say you dont have one, and i’ll pm it to you) in this case, the interface is 185, so, add this sendFrame126("@whi@Fally", 185); with the rest of your emote’s name (if there are any, if not, my emote names are located 2 lines under setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],1,playerWeapon); with update(); above it. If you don’t understand what i’m saying… [code] setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],1,playerWeapon);

     update();

sendFrame126("@lre@Char", 180);
sendFrame126("@lre@Norm", 181);
sendFrame126("@whi@Varr", 182);
sendFrame126("@whi@Home", 177);
sendFrame126("@whi@Fally", 185);

if(eastergift >= 5) { // easter event
sendFrame126("@lre@Matr", 178);
}
else if(eastergift <= 4) { // easter event
sendFrame126("@bla@Matr", 178); [/code]

  1. Be more specific, I don’t really understand the question

  2. There IS a tut, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,165856.0.html

  3. sorry, Can’t help you with this one.

Hope I helped! If you have anymore questions, feel free to pm me.

Read full topic
item.source: I have varoius questions I like awnsered please

item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

@echo off Color 09 cls :menu title Runserver + Compiler version 1.4 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile%==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler goto checkjavac :compile2 if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3) :compile3 if exist *.java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror) :compile4 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compile5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver goto checkjava :run2 set runjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto run3 :run3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto run6) else (goto run4) :run4 if exist .\server.class (goto run5) else (goto servererror) :run5 %runjava% pause cls goto menu :run6 set runjava= set runjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %runjava% pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7) (goto checkjavac9) :checkjavac9 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10) :checkjavac10 if exist checkjavac12) :checkjavac12 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set item.title: I have varoius questions I like awnsered please
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

There was a tutorial on how to fix the ways npc attack not too long ago, and to fix ur 2h problem, go into one of the item. java and find 2h. Ull see a list of 2h weapons… Put ur 2h in with the rest. Im not sure which item.java so ask sum 1 else

and to use emotes as a command, you first have to find which emote you want. I can make the command for you.

Read full topic
